name: The Balloon Game
overview:
The Balloon Game by Coastal Amusements offers classic style gameplay in a family friendly format for a single player per cabinet.

The objective behind The Balloon Game is simple – As the game starts, balloons will rise towards the top of the screen. Use the one button control to move the spike platforms to one side or another. Your goal is to keep the balloons from popping by having them move through the gaps. Earn tickets as balloons pass through and collect enough of them to win the jackpot ticket bonus!
